hadiths.text: A'isha reported Allah's Apostle (ﷺ) saying:If a company of Muslims numbering one hundred pray over a dead person, all of them interceding for him, their intercession for him will be accepted

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ صَلَّى عَلَيْهِ مِائَةٌ شُفِّعُوا فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: If one hundred (people) pray for a person, they will intercede for him
